Transfer of NGN 100 to OLUWASEYIFUNMI SULAIMON IPAYE is successful. Dial *737*73# to sell N10,000 airtime /data and get N1000 airtime reward.

Sharpsend supports various types of apps for testing accessibility features. All the UI elements are been labeled properly that will enable visually impaired (screen readers) and motor-impaired users to navigate the entire application with less stress. If you want to use these accessibility features, you can use any apps but we recommend -- Android Accessibility Suites and Voice access. 
 Android Accessibility Suite (formerly Google Talkback) is an accessibility feature that helps the visually impaired navigate their devices. If this app has been installed, you can activate it on your device settings so as to use it for Sharpsend. Download on Google PlayStore. 
Voice access is a voice-operated interface that can be accessed anywhere on your Android device by mentioning "Hey Google" to activate it. It enables you to perform any operations without having to touch your phone and Sharpsend is built to work well with Google Assistant. You can access Sharpsend through Google Assistant to perform financial operations with your voice without having to touch your device during this process. 
At Sharpsend, we are passionate about building an inclusive platform to enable anyone to perform critical financial operations with zero stress.
Hi Friend! \nWhat should we call you?
